title: Confectioner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Muffin Man (Night): Choose two targets. If the first player has not visited you, you will redirect them to your second target.
- Savory Roll (Night, 3 use): Give a player a savory roll. They may use their night abilities on two targets at night. This will appear as if a Baker has given them bread.
- We Have Cookies (Night, 1 use): The Mastermind may choose to convert two targets tonight. If either conversion fails, both conversions will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Only one Unseen member may have a Savory Roll at any point, and you may not give it to the Mastermind or Assassin.
- You are roleblock and redirect immune.
